## Research question
Can the peak eosinophil baseline be predicted with classical machine learning using the measured nutrient intake data.
```{r}
# http://www.milanor.net/blog/how-to-open-an-spss-file-into-r/
library(foreign)
#install.packages("janitor")
library(janitor)
library("memisc")
dataset = read.spss("../data/Datafile compleet 20-03-2020 voor Hanze SET def.sav", to.data.frame=TRUE, use.value.labels=F, reencode=F, use.missings	=F)
dataset <- remove_empty(dataset, which = c("rows", "cols"), quiet = TRUE)
hist(dataset$PeakEosBaseline_Max)
plot(dataset$PeakEosBaseline_Max, dataset$B.Irontotal)
summary(dataset$B.kCal)
```
